reviews.review_msg: Becky's classes are life changing. I honestly mean it, they should be mandatory for everyone in every program. I cannot recommend her as a prof enough. One warning: it is impossible to know what she will love or hate in an assignment or project, but normally if you put a lot of care and work into it- you will be rewarded.

most kind, most loving, most accepting, most non-judgemental, most inspiring professor at SFU. Will always allow you to rework your pieces if you want a higher grade, and will always email back promptly. Becky always invites questions/comments in class. Becky is extraordinarily hilarious and inviting. By week two, we were all being vulnerable. LOVE

In person, no technology, hand written papers were difficult, but reasonable. Really insightful class. I would only recommend if you are going to put the time and effort in, but it is interesting and one of the most valuable courses.
great prof. take a course with her if ever get the chance to

Nadine is one of my fav profs, super caring, nice, accommodating & passionate about what she teaches. Truly wants you to succeed & gives you all the tools required. Syllabus/grading is very clear/straightforward and the readings were also very interesting. Super easy to get in touch with & gives feedback quickly. Take her class if you can! Love!!

Lectures were structured poorly. She  provided unclear instructions for assignments and was rude to students who asked for elaboration. Harsh marker and provides very unhelpful feedback. Canceled multiple classes day of.

Very tough grader. Class average on most assignments was not high and she rarely gives full marks to anyone. Syllabus, assignment criteria, and feedback were always vague and not helpful. Ask for help and she tells you to look at the syllabus. I would suggest taking a different class with someone else.

FRIENDS THIS IS A WARNING. Professor Patterson is EXTREMELY unclear about her expectations, does not provide clear feedback, and the online delivery is overall just poor. DON'T DO IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
